Statute.Title: Marine Mammal Regulations (seal fishery observation licence), An Act respecting the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Mammifères marins (permis d’observation pour la pêche du phoque), Loi concernant le Règlement sur les)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 28, s. 1 in force on assent 18.06.2015; within 60 days after this Act comes into force (18.08.2015), the Governor in Council is to make amendments to the Marine Mammal Regulations see s. 1.
